that's how. Take this example from Colin Thomas of Maidstone, who admires the concise nature of our offering. "I've treated my busy wife to your excellent newspaper with surprising consequences," he writes. Tonight I arrived home from work before her to be greeted by a terse note that read: "Peel potatoes, light fire, walk dog. X" I appear to be paying a high price for a low-cost publication.
